title: pbe entry
body: I have been waiting almost 2 years to get into the pbe and some of my friends got in, in about 6 months or so did my request somehow get lost ?

replies.body:
Getting into the PBE isn't just based upon how long ago you've applied. While the criteria changes a lot of the time, we generally look for players who are really active and are a positive influence in the community. Sometimes if we are looking to rework a certain champ, we'll send out invites to players who main that champ, but it really depends on what we're testing at the time.

You can find out complete breakdown of the PBE in our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) Let me know if you have any questions.
Oh okay thanks for taking the time to answer my question.
